document_data.name: Weeping Wyvern
document_data.mainbody: The '''Weeping Wyvern''' was an inn in the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.Location: The Weeping Wyvern lay close by the eastern wall of Tantras, at the end of Stumble Street.
document_data.Description: It was a large, good-quality establishment, with high prices but often crowded.
document_data.History: The Weeping Wyvern was still fairly new in the [[1358 DR|Year of Shadows, 1358 DR]]. During the [[Time of Troubles]] of that year, it avoided being commandeered by the [[Guard (Tantras)|Guard]] of Tantras for use as an army barracks.
